item.content:encoded:
Share a Memory Simple Funeral Attendance Card

Hot Deals! Share a Memory Simple Funeral Attendance Card – Sympathy Cards Share a Memory Simple Funeral Attendance Card ready to ship the fastest Share a Memory Simple Funeral Attendance Card Try to read more firstThese share a memory attendance cards can be placed out at your Celebration of Life or funeral service so that guests can share a special memory or leave words of love.

**PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING**

Our Petite range of budget stationery measures 4.5" x 5.6" and is printed on bright white cardstock with a semi-gloss finish and 110lbs weight.

We DO NOT advise you to choose the satin paper option as that is a much thinner 80lb paper, which is more akin to magazine pages than cardstock.

If you make changes to the shape or size or choose another product and the design is cropped in any way or doesn’t look right on the page you will need to use the Live Design Service to have someone adjust the layout for you, unless you are comfortable doing it yourself.

There is no manual check or intervention between the placement of the order and the printing, so what you see on the screen is what will be printed and shipped to you.

With this in mind please also triple-check for any spelling mistakes or incorrect information before you place your order. Price:$1.33

Hot Deals! Share a Memory Simple Funeral Attendance Card ($1.33)
